<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sequences of adjacent SMEM and VMEM instructions if XNACK is enabled. A</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// load that would overwrite a pointer would require breaking the soft clause.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Artificially extend the live ranges of the pointer operands by adding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// implicit-def early-clobber operands throughout the soft clause.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This pressure check is fundamentally broken. First, this is checking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the global pressure, not the pressure at this specific point in the</span></CodeLine>
